name: Qwyllion
description: The Qwyllion is a medium-sized aberration with exceptional agility, marked by a blend of physical and magical traits. It showcases sharp claws and a menacing gaze geared towards both melee and ranged combat.
memorable: Its ability to charm and control the dead makes it a fearsome opponent and a powerful manipulator in combat.
goals: To control and charm other creatures and build an army of specters.
relations: May encounter undead creatures or other manipulative beings.
environment: Found in dark or twisted areas, often lurking in shadows.
strengths: Exceptional agility and resilience with strong poison-based abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to mental defenses due to lower Intelligence.
attacks: Utilizes claw attacks for melee combat and deadly gaze for ranged psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Nauseating Stench can incapacitate and poison creatures within its vicinity.
senses: Has darkvision, allowing it to see in dim light.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics, allowing for dexterous maneuvers in combat.
additional_information: Resistant to acid and fire damage
Capable of controlling up to ten specters
Can immobilize key players with its poison mechanic
Dexterity score of 20 grants a +8 to Dexterity saving throws
Charms creatures for a day with verbal commands
test_queries: manipulative creature that raises the dead
creature that controls specters after death
